title: Anybody have a T3 Tenney Available?

posts.post_title: Anybody have a T3 Tenney Available?
posts.post_content:
Need just Tenney (NY) to complete the base set...also need these three variations: 90a doolin 112b Paskert (cin and p) 122b Tenney (ny&b).  Any help? (Low grades preferred)

Mac
